title: PBL-Based Blended Learning Program for Strengthening Visual Perception Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Learners are office/administrative professionals requiring enhanced medical diagnostic document analysis and visual information processing skills. Conducted in a blended online/offline environment using digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% accuracy by combining active (performing self-diagnosis) and passive (observing expert interpretations) tasks when analyzing complex visual materials
Learners maintain over 75% diagnostic accuracy in challenging skin lesion classification tasks during delayed assessments spaced two weeks apart
Learners document visual perception learning strategies in project-based activities and engage with peer feedback at over 90% participation rate
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
